features.main: All plans include access to our premium resource library and customer support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our platform and services.

whatIsResourceHub.question: What is Resource Hub and how does it work?
whatIsResourceHub.answer: Resource Hub is a premium platform that provides access to millions of high-quality creative resources from top platforms like Freepik, Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, and more. We offer a credit-based system where you can download premium content using credits from your subscription plan.

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work and what can I download with them?
howCreditsWork.answer: Credits are used to download premium resources from supported platforms. Each download typically costs 1 credit, regardless of the file type (images, vectors, videos, or templates). Your credits are valid for the duration of your subscription period and can be used across all supported platforms.

supportedPlatforms.question: Which creative platforms are supported?
supportedPlatforms.answer: We support major creative platforms including Freepik, Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Getty Images, Unsplash, and many more. The number of supported platforms varies by subscription plan, with premium plans offering access to more platforms and exclusive content.

howToDownload.question: How do I download resources from the platform?
howToDownload.answer: Simply search for the content you need, select the resource you want, and click download. The system will automatically use one credit from your account and provide you with the high-quality file. All downloads are instant and available in multiple formats when applicable.

safetyLegal.question: Is it safe and legal to use these resources?
safetyLegal.answer: Yes, absolutely! All resources available through our platform are legally licensed and safe to use for commercial and personal projects. We maintain partnerships with content creators and platforms to ensure all downloads are legitimate and properly licensed.

musicRestrictions.question: Can I download music or audio files from this platform?
musicRestrictions.answer: No, our platform does not support music downloads or any audio content. We strictly focus on visual creative resources such as images, vectors, graphics, and videos. Music downloads are prohibited due to copyright and licensing restrictions. For audio content, please use specialized music licensing platforms.

pricingPlans.question: What pricing plans are available and what's included?
pricingPlans.answer: We offer flexible subscription plans ranging from basic to premium tiers. Each plan includes a specific number of monthly credits, access to different platforms, and various features. Premium plans offer more credits, access to exclusive content, priority support, and advanced features like bulk downloads and API access.

accountManagement.question: How do I manage my account and subscription?
accountManagement.answer: You can manage your account through your dashboard where you can view your credit balance, download history, update payment methods, change subscription plans, and modify account settings. You can also cancel or pause your subscription at any time without penalties.

technicalSupport.question: What technical support options are available?
technicalSupport.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support through multiple channels including live chat, email support, and phone support for premium users. Our support team can help with account issues, download problems, billing questions, and technical troubleshooting. Response times vary by plan level.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are available for download?
fileFormats.answer: We support a wide range of file formats including JPG, PNG, SVG, EPS, AI, PSD, MP4, MOV, and more. The available formats depend on the original content and platform. Most resources are available in multiple formats and resolutions to suit different project needs.

troubleshooting.question: What should I do if downloads fail or I encounter errors?
troubleshooting.answer: If you experience download issues, first check your internet connection and try refreshing the page. Clear your browser cache and cookies if problems persist. For failed downloads, your credits will be automatically refunded. Contact our support team if issues continue, and we'll resolve them quickly.

commercialUsage.question: Can I use downloaded resources for commercial projects?
commercialUsage.answer: Yes, all resources downloaded through our platform come with commercial usage rights. You can use them in client projects, marketing materials, websites, apps, and other commercial applications. However, you cannot resell or redistribute the original files as standalone products.

refundPolicy.question: What is your refund and cancellation policy?
refundPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. You can cancel your subscription at any time, and it will remain active until the end of your billing period. Unused credits expire at the end of your subscription period, but we offer pro-rated refunds in certain circumstances.

platformFeatures.question: What advanced features does the platform offer?
platformFeatures.answer: Our platform includes advanced search filters, collections and favorites, download history tracking, bulk download capabilities, API access for developers, team collaboration tools, and integration with popular design software. Premium users get access to exclusive features and priority processing.

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied creators who trust ResourceHub for their creative projects.

reviews.name: Sarah Ahmed
reviews.content: ResourceHub has completely transformed my workflow. The quality of resources and ease of accessing multiple platforms in one place is incredible. I've saved countless hours and my clients love the results.

reviews.name: Michael Johnson
reviews.content: The credit system is brilliant and the variety of platforms available is unmatched. We've been able to maintain consistent visual branding across all our campaigns with high-quality assets from ResourceHub.

reviews.name: Emma Wilson
reviews.content: I love how ResourceHub gives me access to premium content from all my favorite platforms. The download speeds are incredibly fast and the quality is always excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: David Chen
reviews.content: As a freelancer, ResourceHub has been a game-changer. The affordable pricing and access to multiple premium platforms has helped me deliver better results to my clients while staying within budget.

reviews.name: David Chen
reviews.content: As a freelancer, ResourceHub has been a game-changer. The affordable pricing and access to multiple premium platforms has helped me deliver better results to my clients while staying within budget.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your account

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

cookies.title: Web Cookies
cookies.content: If you leave a comment on our site, you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year. If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after one day.

embeddedContent.title: Embedded content from other websites
embeddedContent.content: This site may contain embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

dataSharing.title: Who we share your data with
dataSharing.content: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

dataRetention.title: How long we retain your data
dataRetention.content: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue. For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also view and edit that information.

musicRestriction.title: Music Download Restrictions
musicRestriction.content: This platform does not support or facilitate music downloads in any form. We strictly prohibit the downloading, distribution, or sharing of copyrighted music content due to copyright and licensing restrictions. Our services are designed to respect intellectual property rights and comply with applicable copyright laws. Any attempt to use our platform for music-related downloads may result in account suspension or termination.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At ResourceHub, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect several types of information from and about users of our platform, including: (1) Personal Information: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. (2) Usage Data: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our platform, including pages visited, downloads, search queries, and time spent on our site. (3) Device Information: We collect information about your device, including IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers. (4) Cookies and Tracking Data: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing behavior and preferences.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: (1) Providing and maintaining our services, including processing downloads and managing your account. (2) Personalizing your experience and improving our platform based on your preferences and usage patterns. (3) Communicating with you about your account, updates, and promotional offers (with your consent). (4) Processing payments and preventing fraud. (5) Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights and the rights of others. (6) Analyzing usage trends to improve our services and develop new features.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances: (1) Service Providers: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, processing payments, or providing customer support. (2) Legal Requirements: We may disclose information when required by law, court order, or government request. (3) Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction. (4) Consent: We may share information with your explicit consent for specific purposes.

cookiesTracking.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookiesTracking.content: We use cookies, web beacons, and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and collect information about how you use our platform. These technologies help us: (1) Remember your preferences and settings. (2) Analyze site traffic and usage patterns. (3) Provide personalized content and recommendations. (4) Improve our services and user experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our platform.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include: (1) Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest. (2) Regular security assessments and updates. (3) Access controls and authentication mechanisms. (4) Employee training on data protection practices. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including: (1) Access: The right to request access to your personal information. (2) Correction: The right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information. (3) Deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal information (subject to certain exceptions). (4) Portability: The right to receive your personal information in a portable format. (5) Objection: The right to object to certain processing of your personal information. (6) Withdrawal of Consent: The right to withdraw consent where processing is based on consent. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws than your country. When we transfer your information internationally, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information, including: (1) Adequacy decisions by relevant authorities. (2) Standard contractual clauses approved by relevant authorities. (3) Certification schemes and codes of conduct. (4) Other legally recognized transfer mechanisms.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. The retention period depends on various factors, including: (1) The type of information and the purposes for which it was collected. (2) Legal, regulatory, or contractual requirements. (3) The need to resolve disputes or enforce our agreements. (4) Your preferences and choices regarding data retention. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our platform is not intended for children under the age of 13 (or the minimum age required in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under this age. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the applicable age without parental consent, we will take steps to delete such information. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites, services, or applications that are not owned or controlled by us. This Privacy Policy does not apply to these third-party services. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party services you access through our platform. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party services.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. For significant changes, we may also provide additional notice, such as email notification. Your continued use of our platform after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Email: privacy@resourcehub.com | Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567 | Address: ResourceHub Privacy Team, 123 Privacy Street, Data City, DC 12345, United States. We will respond to your inquiries within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable law.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: Understanding how we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide better services.

introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how ResourceHub uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website. We want to be transparent about the data we collect, how we use it, and the choices you have regarding cookies. By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Essential cookies are necessary for the basic functionality of our website. These cookies enable core features such as security, network management, and accessibility. Without these cookies, services you have asked for cannot be provided. Essential cookies are always enabled and cannot be disabled.

examples.title: Examples of Essential Cookies:
examples.sessionCookies: Session cookies for user authentication and security
examples.securityCookies: Security cookies to prevent fraudulent activity
examples.loadBalancing: Load balancing cookies to distribute server load

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. These cookies allow us to count visits, identify traffic sources, and understand which pages are most popular. This information helps us improve our website and user experience.

examples.title: Examples of Analytics Cookies:
examples.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics cookies to track website usage
examples.pageViews: Page view tracking cookies to understand content popularity
examples.userBehavior: User behavior analysis cookies to improve site navigation

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites with the intention of displaying relevant and engaging advertisements. These cookies may be set by us or by third-party advertising partners. They help us deliver personalized content and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

examples.title: Examples of Marketing Cookies:
examples.advertising: Advertising cookies to display relevant ads
examples.retargeting: Retargeting cookies to show personalized content
examples.socialMedia: Social media cookies for sharing and engagement tracking

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Third-party cookies are set by domains other than ResourceHub. These cookies are typically used by external services we integrate with, such as social media platforms, payment processors, or analytics providers. We do not control these cookies, and their use is governed by the privacy policies of the respective third parties.

examples.title: Examples of Third-Party Cookies:
examples.socialPlugins: Social media plugins and sharing buttons

management.title: Cookie Management
management.content: You have several options to manage and control cookies on our website. You can modify your browser settings to accept or reject cookies, delete existing cookies, or receive notifications when cookies are being set. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

options.title: Cookie Management Options:
options.browserSettings: Browser settings to control cookie acceptance and deletion
options.cookiePreferences: Cookie preference center to customize your choices
options.optOut: Opt-out links for specific third-party services

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under applicable privacy laws, you have certain rights regarding cookies and the data they collect. You have the right to be informed about cookie usage, give or withdraw consent, and access information about the cookies we use. We respect your privacy choices and provide tools to exercise these rights.

rights.title: Your Cookie Rights:
rights.consent: Right to give or refuse consent for non-essential cookies
rights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent at any time
rights.information: Right to information about cookies and their purposes

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Cookie Policy or our cookie practices, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and transparently.

info.title: Contact Details:
info.address: Address: ResourceHub Cookie Team, 123 Cookie Street, Data City, DC 12345, United States

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
